text: BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto posylaye viter, shchob zbudyty khmary, shchob buty rozpovsyudzhenyy vsyudy nebo z·hidno z Yoho bude. Vin todi nahromadzhuye khmary, todi vy bachyte doshch prybuttya vnyz zvidty. Koly yomu padinnya na whomever Vin vybyraye z chysla Yoho sluzhbovtsiv, vony tishatʹsya
